item.title: Anne-Marie add a quote by Amy Tan
item.description: "Writing what you wished was the most dangerous form of wishful thinking." -- Amy Tan

item.title: Anne-Marie add a quote by L.M. Montgomery
item.description: "I suppose it was a romantic was to perish... for a mouse" -- L.M. Montgomery

item.title: Anne-Marie add a quote by L.M. Montgomery
item.description: "We don't know where we're going, but isn't is fun to go?" -- L.M. Montgomery

item.title: Anne-Marie add a quote by L.M. Montgomery
item.description: "But pearls are for tears, the old legend says," Gilbert had objected. "I'm not afraid of that. And tears can be happy as well as sad. My very happiest moments have been when I had tears in my eyes—when Marilla told me I might stay at Green Gables—when Matthew gave me the first pretty dress I ever had—when I heard that you were going to recover from the fever. So give me pearls for our troth ring, Gilbert, and I'll willingly accept the sorrow of life with its joy." -Anne" -- L.M. Montgomery

item.title: Anne-Marie add a quote by L.M. Montgomery
item.description: "The future is yet an untrodden path full of wonderful possibilities." -- L.M. Montgomery
